title: Drawing, "Botanical Sketches, possibly Coleus, Pandi, Colombia", July 1853
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Dark green / polished leaf / very large;             again at center left: very large leaved /  plant light yellowish green / 2- Dark              reddish green ribs / against the light; and at center: Pandi  / July -53-

Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at right: Form of Coleus
description: Horizontal view of plants, with two plants at left row and group of plants at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Sketches, possibly Coleus, Pandi, Colombia", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-87.
